    • 方法详细资料

      • isConfigured

        public static boolean isConfigured​()
        test is configured
        返回:
        boolean, true if configured

      • dropAll

        public static int dropAll​(java.lang.String db)
        drop all tables for the "db", the "db" name was configured in "giiwa.properties", such as: db[ttt].url=....
        参数:
        db - the db
        返回:
        int of how many table was dropped

      • init

        public static void init​()
        initialize the DB object from the "giiwa.properties"

      • getDriver

        public static java.lang.String getDriver​()
        Gets the driver. Derby gives "Apache Derby"
        Microsoft SQL Server gives "Microsoft SQL Server"
        Oracle gives "Oracle"
        PostgreSQL gives "PostgreSQL"
        MySQL gives "MySQL"
        HSQLDB gives "HSQL Database Engine"
        DB2 gives "DB2/....". In my situation it gives "DB2/LINUXX8664"
        H2 gives "H2"
        返回:
        the driver

      • getDriver

        public static java.lang.String getDriver​(java.lang.String name)
        Gets the driver by the db name.
        参数:
        name - the name
        返回:
        the driver

      • getConnection

        public static java.sql.Connection getConnection​()
                                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Gets the connection.
        返回:
        the connection
        抛出:
        java.sql.SQLException - the sQL exception

      • getConnectionByUrl

        public static java.sql.Connection getConnectionByUrl​(java.lang.String name,
                                                     java.lang.String url,
                                                     java.lang.String username,
                                                     java.lang.String passwd)
                                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Gets the connection by url, and create the datasource also if the name is not empty
        参数:
        name - the dbname
        url - the url
        username - the user name
        passwd - the password
        返回:
        the connection by url
        抛出:
        java.sql.SQLException - the SQL exception

      • getConnectionByUrl
